imports:
import Coupon from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/Coupon";
import Text from "@kiwicom/orbit-components/lib/Text";
example:
() => (
  <Text>
    Use
    <Coupon>Baggagefree</Coupon>
    when booking to add free baggage.
  </Text>
)

info.title: Default coupon
info.description: Coupons render their child text as a <mark> element styled as all caps.
